projects.title: Desert Ambience Collection
projects.author: Alek & Juleah Miller
projects.shortDescription: Atmospheric soundscapes inspired by the American Southwest.
projects.detailedDescription: A collection of ambient compositions that capture the vast, contemplative spirit of desert landscapes. These pieces blend field recordings from various southwestern locations with synthesized textures, creating immersive soundscapes for meditation, work, or contemplation.
projects.collaborativeNote: Features field recordings by Juleah Miller

projects.title: Interactive Media Soundtracks
projects.author: Alek Miller
projects.shortDescription: Music composed for games and interactive experiences.
projects.detailedDescription: A growing collection of musical pieces created specifically for interactive media projects. These compositions range from ambient background music for exploration games to dynamic pieces that respond to player actions, showcasing how music can enhance digital storytelling.

projects.title: Collaborative Compositions
projects.author: Alek & Juleah Miller
projects.shortDescription: Musical works created through creative partnership with Juleah Miller.
projects.detailedDescription: Experimental pieces that explore the intersection of visual art and music through close collaboration. These compositions often begin with visual inspiration from Juleah's artwork and evolve through iterative creative dialogue, resulting in unique multimedia experiences.
projects.collaboration: Full creative partnership with Juleah Miller - art and music developed together

tracks.title: Liminal Frequencies
tracks.description: Audio companion to the Liminal comic series

projects.title: Digital Folk Interpretations
projects.author: Alek Miller
projects.shortDescription: Traditional folk themes reimagined through digital and ambient techniques.
projects.detailedDescription: A planned collection that will reinterpret traditional American folk music through the lens of modern digital composition. The project explores how timeless themes of travel, home, and landscape can be expressed using contemporary sonic tools while preserving the emotional core of folk tradition.
projects.concept: Bridging traditional American folk music with contemporary ambient and electronic techniques
projects.inspiration: Desert landscapes and the musical heritage of the American Southwest
